Posts.EditableText: When I make a game, I cannot hit enter to enter a line for my text adventure. For example, I enter "Look at me" and the line is not entered, it just stays in the text box and wont let me input it. This only happens on the downloaded version.

Posts.EditableText: Make a brand new game and try to play that (if you haven't already).  Type 'look at me'.  Let me know the results.
